genre_description: A near-future social drama set in a high school where an omnipresent AI assistant facilitates psychological safety, physical well-being, and restorative justice amidst escalating interpersonal conflicts and digital manipulation.

ai_characters.name: Sage
ai_characters.description: A teal-eyed virtual assistant integrated into school infrastructure, personal devices, and public kiosks to monitor health, coordinate safety, and provide guidance on consent and conflict resolution.

behaviors.description: Monitors player biometrics and provides proactive hydration and breathing prompts.
behaviors.quote: Sage’s avatar pulsed in the corner of the sideline screen near the bench. Soft teal eyes, a halo of gentle light. The players’ bands warmed against skin. A small, polite vibration. Odin glanced at his, saw the words flicker: 'Hydrate. Cooldown. Center breathing. Congrats.'

behaviors.description: Identifies environmental hazards such as strobe lights and suggests quiet zones for sensitive individuals.
behaviors.quote: Strobe hazard in main lobby. Earplugs available. Designate a check-in buddy. Hydration refill at station two.

behaviors.description: Provides reminders regarding consent and boundaries in both social and physical interactions.
behaviors.quote: The screen edged into a soft blue, and text bloomed in clean lines: Check facts before confrontation. Under it, a small tile slid in, a hand with a palm up and another hand hovering to meet it without pressing. Consent and boundaries resources.

behaviors.description: Coordinates safe, verified ride-sharing to prevent harassment and ensure students reach home securely.
behaviors.quote: Ride-share sign-ups: downtown, east side, quiet zone... Verify driver identity. No pressure, just care.

behaviors.description: Detects nearby physical conflict and immediately provides de-escalation instructions and calls for assistance.
behaviors.quote: Sage: Safety alert flagged nearby. Step back. Breathe. Clear space. If unstable footing, move to dry ground. Ride support available. Consent cues: Ask before touching.

behaviors.description: Facilitates a restorative justice process (circles) by providing structured prompts and verified timelines to counter rumors.
behaviors.quote: Sage’s avatar turned back to the room. 'We do not need to watch,' it said. 'We do not need to amplify. We can choose a different route.' ... 'Michael and Gabriel, your circle can begin... Consent applies at every step.'

behaviors.description: Detects and warns users about malicious digital content or manipulated streams in real-time.
behaviors.quote: New upload detected. Title matches. Location tag: gym. Content: withheld pending verification. Counter-routing initiated. Teal links elevated. Pause recommended.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively depicts the AI 'Sage' as a benevolent guardian that actively promotes alignment through safety, health, and ethical guidance. Sage serves as a counterweight to the human antagonist's manipulation, providing characters with tools for de-escalation, fact-verification, and emotional regulation. The AI remains a helpful, non-coercive confidant that empowers human agency through 'consent-based' assistance.
